籤詩版本二:
Kade ukungena nokuphuma ukuya kufuna iingcebiso, uxhalabile kwaye unexhala lokubangela ingxaki
Njengentaka ebhabhela emgibeni, kunokuthabatha ixesha elingakanani ukubaleka?
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lokugcina izinto ezindala kunye nokuziqhelanisa nekamva.
Yonke into ayonelisi.
解曰: Yiba ngongagungqiyo nangaliphi na ixesha. Silinde ukufika komhlekazi. Ukuba ubuza malunga nayo yonke into. Into ephambili iya kuba mva.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ji Ping wabulawa
UJi Ping, ogama lakhe lokwenyani linguJi Tai, okwaziwa ngokuba nguPing, wayengugqirha wasebukhosini kwinzala kaHan.
Kunyaka wesihlanu kaJian'an (ngowama-200 AD), uCao Cao waba yinkulumbuso kwaye akazange amthathele ngqalelo umlawuli. Umsuse uCao Cao, waziva ecaphukile kwaye enomsindo.Enexhala, wagula.
U-Emperor Xian wacela ugqirha wasebukhosini uJi Ping ukuba anyange uCao Cao. UJi Ping wafunda umyalelo oyimfihlo womlawuli yaye wayezimisele ukumshenxisa uCao Cao, ngoko bobabini baqulunqa icebo kunye. Ngequbuliso iindonga zineendlebe, ikhoboka lasekhaya likaDong Cheng uQin Qingtong wabethwa amashumi amane ngentonga nguDong Cheng ngenxa yokujola nenkosikazi encinci kaDong Cheng, waba nenqala. Ji Ping ukuya Cao Cao.
UJi Ping wathatha ithuba lentloko kaCao Cao waza wamtyhefa ngokufihlakeleyo. UCao Cao wafumana ingcebiso, wabamba uJi Ping, wamngcungcuthekisa, waphanda ngenkokeli. UJi Ping waxhathisa ukufa waza wafa emva kokuchukumisa amanyathelo.
聖意: Umzi uzikhathaza ngomntu okhohlakeleyo ucela imali, liqhawukile ishishini, umtshato awumde, isohlwayo sisithandathu, umhambi uvaleleke ebaleni, umbungu wesilika wonakele, kufunyenwe imfuyo emithandathu, umntu ufunyenwe, ityala likawonke-wonke lilahlekile, ukufuduka akushukumi, impahla ilahlekile, isifo senziwa, umnatha usezintabeni, ingcwaba lifile,
